price: Àti pé nígbà tí A bá ṣe ìdẹ̀ra fún ènìyàn, ó máa gbúnrí (kúrò ní ọ̀dọ̀ Wa). Ó sì máa ṣègbéraga. Nígbà tí aburú bá sì fọwọ́ bà á, nígbà náà l’ó máa di aládùáà rẹgẹdẹ.
arabic: وَإِذَآ أَنۡعَمۡنَا عَلَى ٱلۡإِنسَٰنِ أَعۡرَضَ وَنَـَٔا بِجَانِبِهِۦ وَإِذَا مَسَّهُ ٱلشَّرُّ فَذُو دُعَآءٍ عَرِيضٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā anʿamnā ʿalā al-insāni aʿraḍa wanaā bijānibihi wa-idhā massahu al-sharu fadhū duʿāin ʿarīḍin
